name: Sabre Gold Mines Corp.
longDescription: Sabre Gold Mines Corp is a multi-asset near-term gold producer in North America which holds the fully permitted Copperstone mine located in Arizona, the United States and the Brewery Creek mine located in Yukon, Canada both of which are former gold producers. It operates within the United States and Canada.
fulldescription: Sabre Gold Mines Corp is a multi-asset near-term gold producer in North America which holds the fully permitted Copperstone mine located in Arizona, the United States and the Brewery Creek mine located in Yukon, Canada both of which are former gold producers. It operates within the United States and Canada.
fullAddress: 18 King Street East,Suite 902, Suite 250, Toronto, ON, CA
